abstract: Lightning strikes during torrential rainstorm kill 323 reindeer in Hardangervidda, Norway; herding animals' survival instinct is to huddle during storms, habit that caused them to be electrocuted together.

headline.main: Lightning Strike Kills More Than 300 Reindeer in Norway

snippet: “We have never seen anything like this,” said an official from the Norwegian Environment Agency, after an entire herd appeared to have been electrocuted....
lead_paragraph: “We have never seen anything like this,” said an official from the Norwegian Environment Agency, after an entire herd appeared to have been electrocuted.
